endpoints.menu

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • endpoints.menu.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    This class returns the menu items in a JSON format.

      • getCustomerMenu

        public static java.lang.String getCustomerMenu(spark.Request request,
                                               spark.Response response)
        Gets the full menu from the database and returns it in JSON. No JSON input as it is a get request.
        Parameters:
        request - A Spark request
        response - A Spark response
        Returns:
        The menu in JSON as a string

      • getMenu

      • getCategories

        public static java.lang.String getCategories()
        Returns a JSON representation of all the menu categories.
        Returns:
        A string holding the JSON representation.

      • createMenuItem

        public static java.lang.String createMenuItem(spark.Request request,
                                              spark.Response response)
        This method takes JSON to create a new menu item. For details on what JSON is needed view MenuItemParams.
        Parameters:
        request - A HTML request.
        response - A HTML response.
        Returns:
        Success after it adds the item.

      • editMenuItem

        public static java.lang.String editMenuItem(spark.Request request,
                                            spark.Response response)
        This method takes JSON and make menu items editable. For details on what JSON is needed view MenuItemParams.
        Parameters:
        request - A HTML request.
        response - A HTML response.
        Returns:
        Success after it adds the item.

      • unassignMenuItem

        public static java.lang.String unassignMenuItem(spark.Request request,
                                                spark.Response response)
        This method unassigns a menu item from a franchise.
        Parameters:
        request - A HTML request.
        response - A HTML response.
        Returns:
        Success after the menu item has been unassigned.

      • assignMenuItem

        public static java.lang.String assignMenuItem(spark.Request request,
                                              spark.Response response)
        Assigns a menu item to a franchise.
        Parameters:
        request - A HTTP request.
        response - A HTTP response.
        Returns:
        The string "success" if there was no problem creating the assignment.
